content: all in one christmas hat ornament by criss wall i had a huge collection of half balls of yarn i really wanted to use them instead of throwing them out so i started crocheting small toys to leave around for people to find they turned out to be so popular i just can t stop making them this is my first non-amigurumi pattern i wanted a set of small christmas ornaments to give away as part of my raock random acts of crochet kindness gifts this hat is an all in one pattern but it is also in two parts if you want to crochet a pompom for the tip yourself you can or you can sew/glue on a fluffy pompom or bell of your choice it is meant to be fast to make up and changeable to suit what accessories you have notes & materials  yarn of your choice in two colours i have used red and white but i love purple and white and different greens as well  optional pompom bell or bow  ribbon if you want to use ribbon for hanging or adornments  scissors hook tapestry needle etc  please use your choice of hook size for this pattern based on the yarn thickness but as a guide for 8ply/dk i use a 4mm for 10ply/aran i use a 4 5mm hook  the large hat measures around 6 cm 2 1/2 inches both in height and width when you use 8ply/dk and about 5cm 2 inches for the smaller size  yarn required for the larger hat using a 4mm hook 11 metres 12 yards of red and either 6 metres 6 1/2 yards or 3 metres 3 ¼ yards of white depending on if you are crocheting your own pompom or not you will use a little less for the smaller size  the photo tutorial is for the larger hat stitches us terms  chain  slip_stitch slip_stitch  single_crochet single_crochet  half_double_crochet half_double_crochet  increase increase  decrease decrease criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-christmas-hat-ornament instructions larger size christmas hat if you are going to crochet the pompom start at pom 1 if you are going to glue/tie in a bell or pompom after start at row 1 all row are worked in the round without joining crochet pompom pom 1 with the white yarn crochet 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring pom 2 increase in each stitch 12 stitches pom 3 - 4 single_crochet around 12 stitches pom 5 decrease all stitches 6 stitches stuff lightly stuff the pompom complete one more normal single_crochet and change colour to red in this stitch you can change colour in the decrease stitch if you choose but i find it fiddly and annoying… lol continue on with row 2 christmas hat body if you start here - leave a long tail before making your magic_ring this tail will be used to sew the pompom or bell to hat and anchor the tip
